typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Tabla1CliendID
source(output(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Tabla2ClienteID
Tabla1CliendID, Tabla2ClienteID join(Tabla1CliendID@Cliente_ID == Tabla2ClienteID@Cliente_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Tabla1CliendID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Tabla2ClienteID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Estado as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Cod_Postal as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
